metadata.inclusion: Press the Function Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds.
metadata.exclusion: Press the Function Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The LED will light for 1 second to indicate removal.
metadata.reset:
1. Remove the battery from the Sensor
2. Press and hold the Function Button
3. While holding the Function Button, re-insert the battery and wait for 10 seconds
4. The LED will light for 1 second to indicate factory reset
